lead_paragraph: The struggling solar company said it had received a subpoena seeking details related to its failed deal to buy Vivint Solar and transactions with its two publicly listed units, TerraForm Power and TerraForm Global.

headline.print_headline: SunEdison Receives Subpoena From Justice Department
headline.main: SunEdison Receives Subpoena From Justice Department

snippet: The struggling solar company said it had received a subpoena seeking details related to its failed deal to buy Vivint Solar and transactions with its two publicly listed units, TerraForm Power and TerraForm Global.
abstract: Solar company SunEdison is subpoenaed by Justice Dept over firm's failed deal to buy Vivint Solar and other issues.
